statements: SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_contact, room_preference FROM guest_information;
SELECT guest_name, room_preference, guest_contact, guest_id FROM guest_information;
SELECT * FROM guest_information;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name FROM guest_information WHERE room_preference = 'Single';
SELECT guest_name FROM guest_information WHERE guest_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT guest_name, guest_contact FROM guest_information WHERE room_preference = 'Suite';
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE guest_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT guest_name, room_preference FROM guest_information WHERE guest_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT guest_id, guest_contact, room_preference FROM guest_information WHERE guest_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, room_preference FROM guest_information WHERE room_preference IN ('Standard', 'Deluxe') ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM guests WHERE room_preference='King';
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM rooms WHERE max_occupancy >= 4;
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM guests WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM rooms ORDER BY room_type DESC, room_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE room_preference='Ocean View' ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM guests WHERE room_preference IS NOT NULL AND room_preference != 'City View';
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, room_preference FROM guests WHERE room_preference = 'Mountain View' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT room_id, room_number, room_type FROM rooms WHERE max_occupancy >= 2 ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM guests INNER JOIN rooms ON guests.room_preference = rooms.room_type WHERE guests.email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Guests;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Guests ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT guest_id, full_name, email FROM Guests WHERE room_preference IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Addresses ORDER BY city, state;
SELECT guest_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservations WHERE is_checked_in = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Guests;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM Guests ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT guest_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservations WHERE is_checked_in = TRUE ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Guests JOIN Reservations ON Guests.guest_id = Reservations.guest_id WHERE check_out_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, email_address FROM guest_information WHERE room_preference = 'King Suite';
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, contact_number FROM guest_information ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE room_preference IS NULL;
SELECT guest_id, contact_number FROM guest_information WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY guest_name ASC
SELECT guest_name, email_address FROM guest_information WHERE room_preference IS NOT NULL
SELECT guest_name, contact_number, room_preference FROM guest_information ORDER BY room_preference DESC, guest_name ASC
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE guest_name = 'John' OR room_preference = 'Ocean View' ORDER BY guest_id DESC
SELECT guest_name, email_address FROM guest_information WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT name, email FROM guests ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT room_number, room_type, rate FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 2;
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_id, name, email, phone_number, room_preference FROM guests WHERE room_preference IN ('King', 'Queen');
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM guests WHERE room_preference = 'King';
SELECT g.name, b.check_in_date, r.room_type FROM guests g INNER JOIN bookings b ON g.guest_id = b.guest_id INNER JOIN rooms r ON b.room_number = r.room_number WHERE r.capacity >= 2;
SELECT a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.postal_code, g.name FROM addresses a INNER JOIN guests g ON a.guest_id = g.guest_id WHERE g.name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT p.payment_id, p.total_amount, b.check_in_date, b.check_out_date, r.room_type FROM payments p INNER JOIN bookings b ON p.booking_id = b.booking_id INNER JOIN rooms r ON b.room_number = r.room_number WHERE p.total_amount > 1000;
